name: Craterzone pvt ltd
description:
Craterzone is one of the leading consulting and IT staff augmentation services catering to enterprises and organizations.  Our hire a developer program is well established in the industry and has been availed by many international clients in past 2 years.
Our IT staffing solutions consist of Hire a mobile app developer, windows phone developers, and dedicated outsourcing team. Craterzone is a leading offshore development center with in-depth experience in handling projects globally right from defining business strategies to offshore software development, application development, and support & maintenance. The Offshore Development Centre (ODC) has today become the most-preferred business model
